spring.focus: Patio refresh, new cushions, garden party furniture
spring.marketing_tips: Promote bundles and sunshade, bundle with covers.

summer.focus: Outdoor dining, sun protection, lounge seating
summer.marketing_tips: Highlight UV-resistant materials and bundle deals.

autumn.marketing_tips: Offer covers/bundles and pre-winter maintenance services.

sustainability_trends.consumer_interest: Growing demand for eco-friendly and ethically sourced materials.
sustainability_trends.marketing_tips: Use sustainability badges, provide sourcing transparency.

indoor_outdoor_convergence.trend: Seamless transition between interior and exterior living spaces
indoor_outdoor_convergence.marketing_tips: Show dual-use scenarios, cross-sell interior accessories.

competitor_landscape.differentiators: Mint offers higher UV ratings, better maintenance policies, and native British climate testing.
